appDesc.message: E tsenya dikarabo tsa ChatGPT go Brave Search sidebar (e tsamaisiwa ke GPT-4o!)

menuLabel_autoGetAnswers.message: Go Bona Dikarabo ka Tsela e e Itshwarang

menuLabel_widerSidebar.message: Bareng e Kgolwane ya mo Letlhakoreng

helptip_proxyAPImode.message: O dirisa Proxy API gore o seka wa tsena mo tirong ya AI

helptip_streamingMode.message: Go amogela dikarabo mo tseleng e e tswelelang ya tshedimosetso

helptip_autoGetAnswers.message: Go romela dipotso ka go itirisa go BraveGPT fa o dirisa enjene ya go senka

helptip_autoFocusChatbar.message: Auto-focus chatbar nako le nako fa e tlhaga

helptip_autoScroll.message: Auto-scroll answers as they generate in Streaming Mode

helptip_prefixMode.message: Ke tlhoka "/" pele ga ke botsa dipotso gore ke bone dikarabo tse di tshwanelang go bontshiwa

helptip_suffixMode.message: O tlhoka "?" morago ga dipotso tsa dikarabo tse o ka di bontshang

helptip_widerSidebar.message: Bareng e e kafa letlhakoreng la tsebe ya go senka e atolositswe

helptip_stickySidebar.message: E dira gore BraveGPT e bonale mo bareng e e kafa letlhakoreng le eleng ka nako e o tsokotsang ka yone

helptip_anchorMode.message: Anchor BraveGPT go ya kwa tlase mo fensetereng

helptip_bgAnimations.message: SHOW animated background in UI components

helptip_fgAnimations.message: Bontsha ditshwantsho tsa fa pele mo dikarolong tsa UI

helptip_replyLanguage.message: Puo ya BraveGPT go e araba

helptip_colorScheme.message: Sekema sa go bontsha dikarolo tsa BraveGPT UI mo

helptip_debugMode.message: SHOW detailed logging in browser console

prompt_updateReplyLang.message: Puo e e tlhabolotsweng ya karabo

alert_userscriptMgrNoStream.message: Mmanejara wa gago wa dikwalo tsa badirisi ga a tshegetse dikarabo tse di busediwang tsa

alert_isCurrentlyOnlyAvailBy.message: ga jaana e bonwa fela ke

alert_openAIsupportSoon.message: Kemonokeng ya OpenAI API e tlile go tsenngwa mo bogautshwaneng

alert_thenRefreshPage.message: morago ga moo o ntshwafatse tsebe eno

alert_tooManyRequests.message: ChatGPT e tletse ka dikopo tse dintsi thata

alert_parseFailed.message: O reteletswe ke go kgaoganya karabo ya JSON

alert_checkCloudflare.message: Re kopa gore o fete tlhatlhobo ya tshireletso ya Cloudflare

btnLabel_sendQueryToApp.message: Romela potso ya go senka go BraveGPT
